org.apache.fop.render.afp.extensions
Enum ExtensionPlacement

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Enum<ExtensionPlacement>
      org.apache.fop.render.afp.extensions.ExtensionPlacement
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ExtensionPlacement>
public enum ExtensionPlacement
extends java.lang.Enum<ExtensionPlacement>

An enumeration for placement instruction for AFP extensions.

Enum Constant Summary
BEFORE_END
          Place the extension right before the "End" structured field.
DEFAULT
          Place the extension at its default/usual position.
